product_name: Stonewear Designs Dryflex Double Cross Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The best-selling Dryflex Double Cross Tank Top from Stonewear Designs features a unique combination of wide and narrow straps and a full built-in bra for extra support during active sports. Fully supportive built-in bra has moisture-wicking fabric and 1 in. elastic support band. 2 pairs of wide and narrow straps crisscross in back for flair and support. Dryflex polyester/spandex fabric is breathable and wicks moisture so you stay comfortable. Dryflex Double Cross Tank Top from Stonewear Designs features a slim fit. Closeout.
short_description: The best-selling Dryflex Double Cross Tank Top from Stonewear Designs features a unique combination of wide and narrow straps and a full built-in bra for extra support during active sports.
